# stc-metric-button



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property      | Attribute      | Description                                                              | Type     | Default     |
| ------------- | -------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------ | -------- | ----------- |
| `buttonKey`   | `button-key`   | Input key for button - this will be emitted if the close icon is clicked | `string` | `undefined` |
| `buttonTitle` | `button-title` | Input title for button                                                   | `string` | `undefined` |
| `color`       | `color`        | Input color for button                                                   | `string` | `undefined` |
| `subTitle`    | `sub-title`    | Input subtitle for button                                                | `string` | `undefined` |
| `textColor`   | `text-color`   | Input text color for button                                              | `string` | `undefined` |


## Events

| Event                  | Description                                               | Type                  |
| ---------------------- | --------------------------------------------------------- | --------------------- |
| `removeButtonResponse` | Event triggered when a the button remove icon is clicked. | `CustomEvent<string>` |
